name: Fuse Balls
description: Fuse Balls was created with inspirations of minimalistic art design. Circles of various colors fall towards a center gravitational force creating smooth transitions and requiring color matching to fuse circles.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows XP Procesador: Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon XP 1.5 Ghz or higher Gráficos: DirectX 9 compatible, 64MB VRAM DirectX: Versión 9.0 Almacenamiento: 250 MB de espacio disponible
